text: Mazin Fayyadh Ajeel (born 2 April 1997 in Nasiriyah, Iraq) is an Iraqi footballer who plays as a right winger for Al-Shorta in Iraq Premier League. ==International career== Following his impressive performances with Al Naft, scoring five goals during the 2015–16 Iraqi Elite League season. Mazin was called up to the Iraqi NT squad an On 24 July 2016 he made his first international cap with Iraq against Uzbekistan in a friendly match. He scored his first goal in a friendly match against Syria. === International goals === :Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !!
